meanings.sent1: I will salinize the soup by adding a pinch of salt.

meanings.definition: To treat with salt or saline solution.
meanings.sent1: The doctor will salinize the wound to prevent infection.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often salinize the soil to improve crop growth.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally salinized my coffee instead of sugaring it.
meanings.sent4: The old remedy was to salinize the meat to preserve it for longer.
meanings.sent5: She had to salinize the fish tank to create a suitable environment for the marine life.
